node.description: Edge of fast command clock to sample fast command data on. 0=rising, 1=falling (default: rising)
Polarity of fast command data. 1=invert, 0=do not invert (default: do not invert)
Fast command clock source selection. 0=external FC clock, 1=internal FC clock (default: external FC clock)
Fast command data source selection. 0=external FC data, 1=internal FC data (default: external FC data)
External fast command clock activity indicator. 0=external clock inactive, 1=external clock active
